objects.text: • SPACIOUS DESIGN • PREMIUM QUALITY • GOLD HARDWARE

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a premium fashion accessory using a minimalist and elegant composition. Central to the layout is a high-resolution product image (`product_image`) of a tan leather handbag, placed against a soft radial background gradient that adds depth. Two large concentric circles—one softly contrasted behind the product and another in the top right—frame the visuals with gradient colors. The heading (`heading`) is bold and modern, while the subheading (`subheading`) provides a product tagline in a refined serif typeface. The circular price tag (`price`) adds emphasis to the value proposition. At the bottom, key product features (`description`) are presented in a centered row. A shop call-to-action (`cta` and `cta_background`) sits prominently in a gold-toned button.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #F5EEE8  
- Accent Gradient (Circle): #E8D0C0 → #D9BBA8  
- Price Tag Gradient: #E8C496 → #C4A278  
- Text Colors: #8B5A2B (heading), #A67C52 (subheading), #6B4226 (description and price)  
- CTA Button: #C4A278  
- CTA Text: #FFFFFF
product_color: This product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel-brown tone (#B47C5B), serving as the dominant base color. The bag features smooth, textured leather that reflects light subtly, giving it a refined look. Gold metallic accents (#D4AF37) on the handles, logo, and charm details add a luxurious contrast and highlight, drawing attention without overwhelming the base color. The bag’s overall color scheme is gracefully minimalistic, making it versatile and elegant. For an advertisement banner, a palette of Camel Brown (#B47C5B), Gold (#D4AF37), Cream White (#F8F5F2), and Warm Taupe (#9D7254) would create a chic and cohesive design.
